reset
set xrange [42.12076355102624:52.755593768712146]
set yrange [5.186548947217041:19.328439944776804]
set size ratio 1.0
set title "Bierkonsum, Iterationen: 100"
unset xtics
unset ytics
$data << EOD

plot \
'$data' using 1:2:3:5 with circles lc var notitle, \
'$data' using 1:2:4:5 with labels font "arial,9" tc variable notitle
